title: Computer Science
description: Academic discipline covering algorithms, data structures, software engineering, and computational theory.

title: Databases
description: Systems and technologies for storing, managing, and retrieving structured data efficiently.

title: Design
description: Creating visual and interactive designs for digital products, focusing on aesthetics and user experience.

title: DevOps
description: Practices combining software development and IT operations to shorten development cycles and improve deployment reliability.

title: Development
description: Building and creating software applications, websites, and digital solutions through programming and technical implementation.

title: Game Design
description: Designing game mechanics, systems, and player experiences to create engaging and enjoyable games.

title: Leadership
description: Guiding teams, making strategic decisions, and fostering collaboration to achieve organizational goals.

title: Multimedia
description: Creating and integrating multiple forms of media including graphics, audio, video, and interactive content.

title: Programming Languages
description: Languages and syntaxes used to write code and create software applications across various platforms.

title: Software
description: Tools, applications, and platforms used for development, design, collaboration, and system management.

title: TTRPGs
description: Tabletop role-playing games, collaborative storytelling experiences played with dice, rules, and imagination.

title: UX
description: User Experience design, focusing on creating intuitive, accessible, and enjoyable interactions between users and products.

title: Writing
description: Creating written content including creative writing, technical documentation, and narrative storytelling.

title: AI
description: Artificial intelligence tools, platforms, and APIs for enhancing development workflows and creating intelligent applications. My Stance On AI
